import StudioSceneManager from"./StudioScene/StudioSceneManager";export default function GameManger(canvas,engine){var _this=this;//Define Canvas
this.canvas=canvas;//Define Engine
this.engine=engine;this.engine.enableOfflineSupport=true;//Create StudioScene Instacne (StudioScene Manager)
this.studioSceneManager=new StudioSceneManager(this);//Create scene
this.CurrentScene=this.studioSceneManager.CreateScene();// The render function
this.engine.runRenderLoop(function(){_this.CurrentScene.render();});// Resize the babylon engine when the window is resized
window.addEventListener("resize",function(){console.log(" resize From GameManager Babylon",_this);_this.engine.resize();},false);}GameManger.prototype={};
